channel.title: Vesta
channel.description: my vesta longsword can't be worn with a shield how do i fix this?

item.title: Vesta
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:16, topic:551044”]I think I’ve figured it out.

in the code you just posted, it has this huge if statement:

if (itemName.contains("godsword") || itemName.contains("double") || itemName.contains("gs") || itemName.contains("claw") || itemName.contains("saradomin sword") || itemName.contains("2h") || itemName.contains("spear")){ return true; }
But specifically, lets look at one of these…

I don’t know about you, but I believe most longswords have the letters “g” and “s” right next to each other…

Try removing it. (All you need to remove is the part I put in the last code box above)[/quote]

lmfao. Good catch.

Read full topic

item.title: Vesta
item.dc:creator: @starbeast199 starbeast199
item.description:
@starbeast199 wrote:

[code] *two handed weapon check
**/
public boolean is2handed(String itemName, int itemId) {
if(itemName.contains(“ahrim”) || itemName.contains(“karil”) || itemName.contains(“verac”) || itemName.contains(“guthan”) || itemName.contains(“dharok”) || itemName.contains(“torag”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“longbow”) || itemName.contains(“FlameBow”) || itemName.contains(“shortbow”) || itemName.contains(“ark bow”)) {
return true;
}
if(itemName.contains(“crystal”) || itemName.contains(“maul”) || itemName.contains(“cannon”)) {
return true;
}
if (itemName.contains(“godsword”) || itemName.contains(“double”) || itemName.contains(“gs”) || itemName.contains(“claw”) || itemName.contains(“saradomin sword”) || itemName.contains(“2h”) || itemName.contains(“spear”)){
return true;
}
if (itemName.contains(“zaryte”)) {
return true;
}
switch(itemId) {
case 6724: // seercull
case 11730:
case 4153:
case 6528:
case 10887:
case 14484:
case 19984:

		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

/**[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Vesta
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“starbeast199, post:13, topic:551044”]i meant 13899 sorry about that
but those were the 2 codes that pop up
should i change it or added it to under the 2 handed weps?
i want to add it to where i can where a shield with my vesta longsword[/quote]
You should be removing something from the code that handles two handed weapons, not adding. By default all weapons can have a shield equipped with them.

Post your code for the is2handed method. It’s probably going to be in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Vesta
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Easiest solution I can see here:

go to the “src” directory of your PI server.
There should be only a “server” folder visible.

Now, search for the ID of the vesta longsword.

It’s probably going to show up in ItemAssistant, or a class similar.

Post the methods (Along with the class names) where you found the item id.

Also it may be worth noting the id as I don’t remember every ID in the history of rs.

Read full topic

item.title: Vesta
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[U]\src\server\model\items[/U]

/** *two handed weapon check **/ public boolean is2handed(String itemName, int itemId) { if(itemName.contains("karil") || itemName.contains("verac") || itemName.contains("guthan") || itemName.contains("dharok") || itemName.contains("torag")) { return true; } if(itemName.contains("longbow") || itemName.contains("shortbow") || itemName.contains("ark bow")) { return true; } if(itemName.contains("crystal")) { return true; } if (itemName.contains("godsword") || itemName.contains("anchor") || itemName.contains("claws") || itemName.contains("aradomin sword") || itemName.contains("2h") || itemName.contains("spear")){ return true; } switch(itemId) { case 6724: // seercull case 11730: case 4153: case 6528: case 1853: case 14484: case 6527: case 18353: return true; } return false; }

Check if it’s in here.

Read full topic
